item.title: Azure B2C oAuth on Postman
item.description: I had a problem where I needed to get my JWT token from Azure B2C OAuth 2.0 in order to troubleshoot an issue I was having in getting OAuth 2.0 working. Situation I needed to get the JWT token using Postman, decrypt it, and then provide it for troubleshooting the issue. How did I do that Get postman Create a new request, as far as I am aware it makes no difference what type of request you use so in this example, I will use a GET request.

item.title: PFX certificate for FREE for Power Pages
item.description: Introduction Do you want to deploy Power Pages on a custom domain securely without the need to buy a custom certificate? In this blog post, I’m going to show you how to do this quickly and easily acquire a PFX certificate that you can then use to deploy to Power Pages. Pre-requisite This is a brilliant tool for generating SSL, and it is simple to use and quick to deploy.
